The claim suggests that President Trump: s previous flu vaccines may have made him more susceptible to contracting COVID-19.
The Instagram post from: holistichealthandmore raises the question of whether the flu vaccines played a role in President Trump's COVID-19 diagnosis, citing a clip from an interview with Laura Ingraham.
The expert: s verdict mentions that some scientists have suggested that the flu vaccine may offer protection against COVID-19 rather than increased susceptibility.
